email_content:
Dear University of Excellence Alumni,

We are thrilled to share a brief snapshot of the application cycle for the upcoming academic year.

�0 Highlights so far:
�00�00�00 • Total applications received: 5,000
�00�00�00 • Average SAT score: 1420
�00�00�00 • Average ACT score: 32
�00�00�00 • Applicants represent more than 100 countries around the world

These numbers underscore the growing interest in the University of Excellence and the continued rise in academic strength and global diversity of our prospective students. Your ongoing support and ambassadorship play a crucial role in attracting such an outstanding applicant pool.

We will keep you updated as we move through the review process and prepare to welcome the next generation of Excellence scholars.

Thank you for all that you do for our community.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]
Office of Admissions
University of Excellence
